headline: Is Capital One Financial (COF) Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Capital One Financial's share price still reflects its true worth, this article walks through the numbers so you can judge the value for yourself. The stock recently closed at US$206.74, with returns of 2.9% over 1 year, 100.4% over 3 years and 83.9% over 5 years, although the share price has seen a 6.0% decline over 7 days, 13.5% over 30 days and 16.6% year to date. Recent coverage has focused on Capital One Financial's position as a large US card and banking...
